metadata.title: CVE-2023-50569 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Cacti v1.2.25, allowsremote attackers to escalate privileges when uploading an xml template filevia templates_import.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-50569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.26+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.26+ds1-1').
